posts.message:
[align=center][img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/w-purple.png[/img]

[b][size=xx-large][color=#ffffff][u]Hack Forum News - Edition Two[/u][/color][/size][/b]

[b]Hack Forum News is back this week with another update on the weekly news to keep you up to date on the latest news on site and around the world. If you have never heard of Hack Forum News, dont worry we have you covered. We are a team of members from the Hack Forums community who are journilists and writers, and we are here to keep you in the loop of the changes around the site and now even around the world.[/b]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/headlines.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer - [/b][/size] [mention=121196]

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6300398][color=#ffffff]Mentors Usergroup Removed[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=1]
This week, Omniscient made the bold decision to disband the Mentors official user group. Despite claims that the Mentors would actively participate and offer help on the forum, it‚Äôs become clear that those promises weren‚Äôt being fulfilled. In light of this, Omniscient has decided to remove the group entirely.

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6300397][color=#ffffff]MRT-X Usergroup Removed[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=1]
After disbanding the Mentor user group earlier this week, Omniscient has now made the call to remove the official MRT-X user group as well. This follows the absence of a leader [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=284502][color=#0066FF][b]Tha Sneak[/b][/color][/url], who has been MIA for over two months, leaving the group inactive and without direction.

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6300774][color=#ffffff]New Jailbreaking, Modding, and Rooting Forum[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=1]
Omniscient has decided to launch a brand-new subforum dedicated to Jailbreaking, Modding, and Rooting - an exciting new space designed to better accommodate the growing discussions and interest around these popular topics.

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/world-header.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Middle East ‚Äì Israel‚ÄìIran Escalation[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Intense exchanges of airstrikes and missile barrages have continued between Israel and Iran, now into their second week. Iranian facilities and nuclear sites were targeted by Israel; in retaliation, Iran struck cities like Haifa and Beersheba‚Äîcausing civilian injuries and an estimated 650+ fatalities in Iran.

[b][url=https://apnews.com/article/israel-palestinians-iran-war-latest-06-20-2025-7c3307c446da24fb8f8ac038e93b9b85]Source[/url][/b]

Diplomatic efforts are underway in Geneva, with Iran signaling willingness to negotiate if Israeli attacks halt, while the EU, UN, Russia, Turkey, and Qatar push for restraint. Meanwhile, the U.S. has repositioned aircraft from Qatar amid caution

[b][url=https://www.theguardian.com/world/live/2025/jun/20/israel-iran-war-live-updates-geneva-talks-trump-khamenei-latest-news]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Markets & Economics[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Global markets showed signs of stabilization despite ongoing Middle East tensions; energy prices spiked but central bank policy divergence‚ÄîFed hawkish, SNB cutting to zero, BoJ dovish‚Äîtempered volatility.

[b][url=https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/global-markets-trading-day-graphic-2025-06-20]Source[/url][/b]

The Bank of England held rates steady at 4.25%, citing inflation inertia amid geopolitical instability; the UK economy grappled with mixed signals around growth, pensions, and corporate performance

[b][url=https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/business-live-latest-news-uk-interest-rate-ftse-100-shares-ceo-summit-hg9hx78td]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]G7 & Global Diplomacy[/color][/size][/b][/u]

The G7 summit in Canada focused heavily on de-escalating Middle Eastern conflict, with UK PM Starmer and Canada‚Äôs PM forging a trade and defense working group.

[b][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/51st_G7_summit]Source[/url][/b]

Australia‚Äôs PM Albanese participated actively, pushing renewable energy, supply chain resilience, and critical mineral alliances while addressing domestic reforms and volcanic disruptions.

[b][url=https://www.theguardian.com/australia-news/live/2025/jun/18/australia-news-live-albanese-g7-starmer-zelenskyy-critical-minerals-trump-aukus-submarines-chalmers-tax-ntwnfb]Source[/url][/b]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/gaming-header.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=811]

[color=#72FF84]Notable console & hardware releases still trending:[/color]
Nintendo Switch 2 - Release date June 6, 2025
[spoiler][img]https://i.imgur.com/dPaZftT.png[/img][/spoiler]
The Nintendo Switch 2 is still being broadly talked about on platforms all throughout the internet. The Switch‚ÄØ2 has maintained its momentum as Nintendo‚Äôs fastest selling hardware ever, clearing 3.5‚ÄØmillion units in four days.

The price of the base Switch 2 along with the newest "Mario Kart World" bundle costs $499. The most expensive Nintendo console to date compared to the 2017 release of the OG Switch at $299.

Recent news about the Switch 2 have been mostly positive throughout consumers. Gamers praise the 7.9‚Ä≥ 1080p HDR LCD, 4K docked/120‚ÄØHz handheld output, dual USB-C ports, and the new GameChat and Mouse Mode features. Gamers critique focus on limited 256‚ÄØGB storage, reliance on expensive MicroSD, battery life lasting 2‚ÄØhours for more resource intensive games and 4 on lighter games, and a fragile kickstand.

[color=#FF5F54][b]AMD launches Radeon RX 9060 XT[/b][/color]
[spoiler][img]https://media.wired.com/photos/68543d7a5dac0d52fed4353d/master/w_1920,c_limit/Radeon%20RX%209060%20XT.png[/img][/spoiler]
This card offers high-end 1080p and reliable 1440p performance, a long-term card with enough VRAM for future games, and a big bang for your buck compared to Nvidia‚Äôs overpriced mid-range lineup.

[color=#72FF84]Buying Tips:[/color]
[list]
[*]Compare models: Variants like XFX, Gigabyte, Sapphire, and Asus differ in cooling, factory overclocks, and aesthetics.
[*]Check stock often: These cards sell quickly at MSRP; price trackers or browser extensions can help catch restocks.
[*]Beware of scalpers: Avoid third-party listings with inflated prices, especially on Amazon.
[*]Factor in taxes/shipping: Newegg and Best Buy may offer free shipping; Amazon may charge extra.
[/list]

Benchmark:[spoiler][img]https://media.wired.com/photos/68543bfd00ad53ee077ad2e4/master/w_1600,c_limit/3DMark%20Benchmarks.png[/img][/spoiler][spoiler][img]https://media.wired.com/photos/68543c0f65a16734c0ccda88/master/w_1600,c_limit/Common%20Games%20-%201080p.png[/img][/spoiler][spoiler][img]https://media.wired.com/photos/68543c18aa045b9ac126dde2/master/w_1600,c_limit/Common%20Games%20-%201440p.png[/img][/spoiler]

[color=#72FF84]Notable News (June 2025)[/color]
[color=#FF5F54][b]Nintendo Switch 2 $1.4M HEIST[/b][/color]
"A semi-truck driver reported that he had just discovered his trailer had been broken into during a pre-trip inspection, and several pallets of the newly released Nintendo Switch 2 game consoles were stolen - 2,810 of them to be exact"

A truck driver in route to a Grapevine, Texas Gamestop from Nintendo's HQ in Redmond, Washington was doing a pre-trip inspection at a Love's Truck Stop in Bennett, Colorado. The driver notified Arapahoe County Sheriff's Office immediately upon realizing his truck had been broken into. Many people throughout the internet believe this to be an inside job. The driver claims "I did not know what was in the trailer, only that it was games or toys". Seems fishy to me, but we will let the investigators do their job and work towards finding the culprits. How can you steal almost 3,000 hand held consoles without anyone realizing what was happening in or around the truck stop? If the suspects are found, they could face charges of felony theft valued at $1 million or more and criminal mischief.

[color=#FF5F54][b]Roblox dethrones Fortnite[/b][/color]
On June 14, 2025, Roblox‚Äôs latest farming simulator ‚ÄúGrow a Garden‚Äù set a new historical record with 16.4 million concurrent users logged in simultaneously. ‚ÄúGrow a Garden‚Äù combines relaxing farming mechanics with social multiplayer features, attracting a diverse base of gamers eager for interaction in the Roblox world.
In 2020, Fortnite hosted a live virtual concert featuring artist Travis Scott. Fortnite peaked at 14.3 million online users during the iconic live concert.


[color=#72FF84]Notable Game Releases (June 2025)[/color]
[spoiler][img]https://i.imgur.com/uzye6FI.png[/img][/spoiler] Mario Kart World (Switch 2)
[spoiler][img]https://i.imgur.com/3BmcsIv.png[/img][/spoiler] Death Stranding 2: On the Beach (PS5)
[spoiler][img]https://i.imgur.com/dpsHNmP.png[/img][/spoiler]Five Nights at Freddy‚Äôs: Secret of the Mimic (PC and PlayStation 5)


üèÜ [color=#72FF84]E-Sports[/color]
CS2 BLAST Austin Major: Running from June 3 to 22, featuring 32 top teams battling for prestige and prize money.
League of Legends MSI: Taking place in Vancouver from June 27 to July 12, MSI returns as one of LoL's biggest global events.
PUBG Mobile Super League (PMSL) CSA Spring 2025 in Almaty, Kazakhstan with a prize pool of $200,000. 20 teams battling for three qualification slots to the PUBG Mobile World Cup 2025 with a prize pool of $3M.
2025 VALORANT Champions Tour (VCT) 12 teams compete for a prize pool of $1M dollars at the Enercare Centre in Toronto, Canada.

[/align]
posts.subject: Hack Forum News - Edition Two

posts.message:
[align=center]
[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/tech-header.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Apple Teases Foldable iPhone for 2026 Launch[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Analyst Ming‚ÄëChi Kuo predicts Apple will release its first foldable iPhone in 2026. Featuring a 7.8 inch inner display, a 5.5 inch outer screen, and a premium $2,000‚Äì2,500 price tag, it's positioned as a luxury entrant in the foldable market.

[b][url=https://www.indiatimes.com/technology/news/apple-to-launch-first-foldable-iphone-in-2026-says-analyst-expected-price-design-features-specifications-661605.html]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Samsung to Roll Out 2025 AI-Enabled Home Appliances[/color][/size][/b][/u]

On June 25th in India, Samsung is launching its Bespoke AI home appliance line. With natural language interactivity, Knox security, and SmartThings integration, these intelligent kitchen and laundry devices will also be available through Samsung Finance.

[b][url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/appliances/samsung-to-launch2025-bespoke-ai-home-appliances-range-in-india-on-june-25/articleshow/121910740.cms]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Android 16 & Samsung One UI 8 Beta Launch[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Android 16 debuted on Pixel devices, bringing LE Audio, enhanced multitasking, and stronger security. Concurrently, Samsung opened One UI 8 beta for the Galaxy‚ÄØS25, offering new animations, privacy settings, and the June security patch.

[b][url=https://www.androidcentral.com/apps-software/android-os/news-weekly-june-14-2025]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Meta Unveils $15‚ÄØB AI Superintelligence Push[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Meta‚Äôs aggressive $15‚ÄØbillion strategy includes a major investment in Scale‚ÄØAI and hiring its founder. This initiative rekindles tensions with Google, whose clients overlap, while Wikipedia paused using AI‚Äëgenerated summaries after community backlash.

[b][url=https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2025/jun/16/meta-ai-wikipedia-apple-iphone]Source[/url][/b]
